longBusinessSummary: MT Educare Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides education support and coaching services in India and internationally. The company offers courses for students in the secondary and higher secondary school, and pursuing graduation degree in commerce and science, as well as preparing for various competitive and chartered accountancy examinations under the Robomate+, Lakshya, Mahesh Tutorials School Section, Mahesh Tutorials Science, and Mahesh Tutorials Commerce names. It also involved in acquiring and leasing properties. MT Educare Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India. MT Educare Limited is a subsidiary of Zee Learn Limited.
